hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I can't get a signal indian suhagrat ki kahani with photo I live in a small town that also houses the largest oil refinery in the US. Bans on smoking my little cigarette are not going to save anyone from the deadly gases emitted from the plant every day. I should imagine the same goes for Los Angeles, New York, Chicago, or any number of other smog filled cities. I’ve solved my problem by never going out, but that is not an option for everyone. I have to agree with the author — alcohol & fast food kill more people than a cigarette, neither of which is particularly restricted. And I resent the smug do-gooders who subject me to their irrational fears.
